price: 67. Y dirán: «¡Señor!, nosotros obedecimos a nuestros líderes y jefes (que rechazaban la verdad), y ellos nos extraviaron.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّآ أَطَعۡنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَآءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا ٱلسَّبِيلَا۠

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā innā aṭaʿnā sādatanā wakubarāanā fa-aḍallūnā al-sabīlā
